articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Recap: Week of Nov 27th
articles.title: Last Week in DeFi - RageTrade V2 Beta Live, Sei Announces V2, Poolshark Announces FIN, Moonwell Rewards on Base, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Launches 🚀 Yearn V3 Live on Polygon Yearn V3 introduces Tokenized Strategies, allowing for standalone, single-strategy vaults that are ERC-4626 compatible. V3 is now on Polygon and will be rolling out slowly, with new Vaults and strategies added over time ahead of launching on other chains.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Yearn V3 Live, Hacker Demands to Take Over Kyber, Cega Dual Currency Strategies, Optimized LPing on Solana, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Launches 🚀 SDX Live on Solana Solana Derivatives Exchange (SDX) launches on Solana. SDX enables options trading on Solana, with mSOL as the first supported option market. Econia Live on Aptos Econia, a Dragonfly-backed on-chain order book, launches on Aptos mainnet. Econia provides the infrastructure and allows users to trade with their frontend partners such as Aries Markets, Gator Trade, KanaLabs, etc.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - SDX Live on Solana, QuickSwap Smart Pools on Manta, Kujira Futures Soon, Easy and Profitable LPing, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Launches 🚀 StakeWise V3 Live StakeWise V3 is now live on the Ethereum mainnet. V3 introduces a new approach to liquid staking, “any node operator and staker on Ethereum can mint osETH, a liquid staking token, to represent ETH staked on their nodes.” V3 also comes with a marketplace of staking offers through smart contracts called Vaults.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Velodrome & Aerodrome Frontend Exploit, StakeWise V3 Live, Cryptex V2 on Arbitrum, NFT Lending on Solana, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Updates 🆕 Call for Cosmos Chain Split In response to a recently passed proposal that reduces ATOM inflation, Cosmos founder Jae Kwon called for a chain split and referred to the hard fork as AtomOne. The forked chain would support the ATOM token along with the native ATOM1.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Call for Cosmos Chain Split, Timeswap Premine on Polygon zkEVM, JITO Token and Airdrop, Yield Boosted LPing, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Recap: Week of Nov 20th
articles.title: Last Week in DeFi - Cosmos to Reduce ATOM Inflation , TreasureDAO to Launch Treasure Chain, Osmosis Halted for 2 Hours, Today in DeFi Cyber Monday Sale, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Launches 🚀 RainFi on Solana RainFi, a P2P NFT lending protocol on Solana, is live. RainFi lets users lend SOL/USDC/mSOL, and borrow SOL using their NFT as collateral. IOTX Liquid Staking Bedrock launches liquid staking for IOTX. IOTX holders can now stake IOTX to receive reward-accruing uniIOTX.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - RainFi NFT Lending on Solana, dYdX Trading Rewards Coming, Automated LPing with Good Rewards, Today in DeFi Black Friday Sale, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Launches 🚀 Dyson Full Version Release Dyson DEX has deployed its full version on Polygon zkEVM and launched the DYSN token. Besides Swaps and Dual Investment, the full version enables the Membership Program, Boosting, and Staking. Asymetrix V2 Live
articles.title: Today in DeFi - KyberSwap 47M Exploit, HecoChain & HTX 110M Exploit, Deri V4 Live, Liquid Staking on Cosmos, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Launches 🚀 Beta Finance V2 Live Beta Finance launches V2 (Omni), a lending market with risk tranches. V2 enables users to choose their level of exposure based on their individual risk appetites. ZKP2P Alpha Live ZKP2P launches an alpha version on Base L2. ZKP2P is a trustless fiat-to-crypto onramp protocol powered by ZKPs.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Beta Finance V2, Dyson Full Launch Soon, Aragon Sues Its Founding Team, Invest in Delta-Neutral Pools, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Recap: Week of Nov 13th
articles.title: Last Week in DeFi - Phantom Wallet Cross-Chain Swaps, Blast L2 Early Access, Range CAKE Bonus, Dydx Insurance Fund Exploited for 9M, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Launches 🚀 1inch Portfolio Tracking 1inch launches a new portfolio tracking feature, allowing users to manage multiple wallets across networks from one place. Kamino Launches V2 Solana-based lending Kamino launches v2 with a new UI, upgraded risk management, and new defi tools.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Kamino V2 on Solana, Perpetual Earn Dashboard, Ether.fi Public Launch, Best Project Picks, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: IntentX Perp Dex on Base IntentX launches an intent-based perp dex with over 180 perpetual markets on Base L2, providing a CEX-like trading experience. Nocturne Privacy Live Privacy protocol Nocturne has deployed its v1 on the Ethereum mainnet, introducing the concept of on-chain private accounts to Ethereum.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - IntentX Perp Dex on Base, Nocturne Privacy Live, JPMorgan Tokenizing Assets with Avalanche, Earn with Idle NFTs, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Dopex V2 Live Dopex launches V2 with CLAMM officially available with Yield boosting & optimization for v3 LPs, and American-style options for traders. Armada V2 Solana-based Armada launches V2 SPL Token Staking and DeMUX. SPL is a governance plugin that allows token holders to vote on DAO proposals while also staking their tokens to receive rewards, and DeMUX allows for semi-automated protocol reward distribution.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Dopex V2 Live, Armada V2 on Solana, LayerZero Launches USDV, LPing Made Simple, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Butter Finance Canceled Butter Fnance announces cancelation for the project as "contributors found the proposed veCAKE system & incentives model to be impractical for a path forward for Butter." Parcl V3 on Solana Solana-based real estate trading protocol
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Butter Finance Cancelled, Real Estate Trading on Solana, Vertex LBA Live, Trading Perps on Solana, and more...

articles.description: Recap: Week of Nov 6th
articles.title: Last Week in DeFi - Raft Exploited for 6.7M, Pika Retiring Token, Ether.fi Launches eETH, RocketPool Announces Houston Upgrade, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: BlackRock Files for Spot ETH ETF BlackRock has filed a spot ETH ETF (iShares Ethereum Trust ETF) through Nasdaq. The ETF would use Coinbase Custody Trust Company as custodian, according to the filing. It will use the CME CF Ether-Dollar Reference Rate - New York Variant.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - BlackRock Files for Spot ETH ETF, Flashbots Founder Launches Telegram Bot, Dyson Live on Polygon zkEVM, Quest to Earn, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Jupiter Launches Perps Solana DEX aggregator Jupiter launched an LP-to-trader perpetual exchange, with the available SOL, ETH, and BTC markets. Binance Web3 Wallet Binance launches Web3 Wallet featuring MPC tech. The wallet generates three key shares, each stored in a separate location: the user’s personal cloud storage, their own device, and Binance’s protected servers.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Jupiter Launches Perps, Binance Web3 Wallet, Lido Lands on Base, Trade Perps on zkSync, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Linea Voyage Live Linea L2 launches Defi Voyage in partnership with IntractCampaign. The first week is starting with MetaMask tasks. Flexlend Live on Solana Solana-based Lulo Finance launches Flexlend, a lending aggregator with limit orders. Vertex Stop Loss/Take Profit Orders
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Linea Voyage Live, Flexlend Launches Solana Lending Aggregator, Vertex Launches SL/TP Orders, Automated V3 Liquidity, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Notional V3 Public Launch Notional V3 is live publicly on Arbitrum. V3 supports 12 currencies for lending and borrowing, and 9 for leveraged yield strategies. And NOTE incentives are live. Quickswap Live on Manta QuickSwap is live on Manta Pacific with token rewards and incentives for traders and LPs.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Notional V3 Public Launch, Quickswap Live on Manta, ARB Staking Approved, Points Program, and more...
